content:
TITLE: Importing Material Symbols in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the material-symbols package in JavaScript files, such as in Create React App or Vue CLI projects. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/material-symbols/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import 'material-symbols'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Material Symbols Icons in HTML DESCRIPTION: Examples of how to display Material Symbols icons in HTML using the different style variants: outlined, rounded, and sharp. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/material-symbols/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols SVGs in React with @svgr/webpack DESCRIPTION: Example of importing and using Material Symbols SVGs as React components using @svgr/webpack. The imported SVG becomes a React component that can be used in JSX. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/700/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import Face from '@material-symbols/svg-700/outlined/face.svg'; // Face is a React component that renders the SVG function App() { return (
); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols Icons in HTML DESCRIPTION: HTML markup examples for displaying Material Symbols icons in outlined, rounded, and sharp styles. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/_template/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Material Symbols Package with npm DESCRIPTION: Command to install the latest version of the material-symbols package using npm. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/material-symbols/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install material-symbols@latest ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Vue Usage Example DESCRIPTION: Example of importing and using Material Symbols SVG icons as Vue components using @svgv/webpack. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/500/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols Icons in HTML DESCRIPTION: Examples of displaying Material Symbols icons in HTML using spans with the appropriate class names for outlined, rounded, and sharp icon styles. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/400/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing SVG as Vue Component DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to import and use a Material Symbols SVG as a Vue component using @svgv/webpack in a Vue application. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/400/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Material Symbols Icons in HTML DESCRIPTION: Examples of how to display Material Symbols icons in HTML using the three available styles: Outlined, Rounded, and Sharp. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/300/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols Icons in HTML DESCRIPTION: HTML code showing how to display Material Symbols icons in three different styles: Outlined, Rounded, and Sharp. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/100/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols SVGs in Vue DESCRIPTION: Example of importing and using a Material Symbol SVG as a Vue component using @svgv/webpack. Demonstrates how to incorporate the SVG into a Vue template and component. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/300/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Material Symbols Icons in HTML DESCRIPTION: HTML examples showing how to display Material Symbols icons using different styles (outlined, rounded, sharp). SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/600/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing Material Symbols with CSS Variables DESCRIPTION: CSS example demonstrating how to customize the variable font axes for Material Symbols, including fill, weight, grade, and optical size. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/material-symbols/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` .material-symbols-outlined { font-variation-settings: 'FILL' 0, 'wght' 400, 'GRAD' 0, 'opsz' 48; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Vue Integration Example DESCRIPTION: Example of importing and using Material Symbols SVGs as Vue components using @svgv/webpack. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/200/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols with Angular mat-icon DESCRIPTION: HTML markup examples for using Material Symbols with Angular's mat-icon component. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/_template/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols in React with @svgr/webpack DESCRIPTION: Example of importing and using Material Symbols SVGs as React components using @svgr/webpack. The imported SVG becomes a React component that can be used in JSX. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/100/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import Face from '@material-symbols/svg-100/outlined/face.svg'; // Face is a React component that renders the SVG function App() { return (
); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols with Angular mat-icon Component DESCRIPTION: Examples of integrating Material Symbols icons with Angular's mat-icon component using the fontSet attribute for different icon styles. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/400/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols with Angular mat-icon Component DESCRIPTION: HTML code showing how to use Material Symbols icons with Angular's mat-icon component in three different styles: Outlined, Rounded, and Sharp. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/100/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols with Angular mat-icon Component DESCRIPTION: Examples of how to display Material Symbols icons in Angular using the mat-icon component with different style variants. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/material-symbols/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols with Angular mat-icon Component DESCRIPTION: HTML examples showing how to use Material Symbols icons with Angular's mat-icon component, specifying different font sets. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/600/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols with Angular mat-icon DESCRIPTION: HTML examples showing how to use Material Symbols icons with Angular's mat-icon component. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/700/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols with Angular mat-icon Component DESCRIPTION: Examples of how to use Material Symbols icons with the Angular Material mat-icon component in various styles. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/300/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols Icons with Angular mat-icon DESCRIPTION: Examples of using Material Symbols icons with different styles in Angular using the mat-icon component. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/500/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing SVGs as React Components DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to import and use Material Symbols SVGs as React components using @svgr/webpack. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/_template/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import Face from '@material-symbols/svg-{{weight}}/outlined/face.svg'; // Face is a React component that renders the SVG function App() { return (
); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Material Symbols Path for Webpack or Vue CLI DESCRIPTION: Sass variable configuration to resolve path issues when using Material Symbols with webpack or Vue CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/material-symbols/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` $material-symbols-font-path: '~material-symbols/'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing Material Symbols Font Settings DESCRIPTION: CSS code for customizing the variable font axes like fill settings for Material Symbols icons. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/_template/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` .material-symbols-outlined { font-variation-settings: 'FILL' 0; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing SVGs as React Components DESCRIPTION: Example of importing Material Symbols SVGs as React components using @svgr/webpack, demonstrating how to use the imported SVG in a React component. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/600/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import Face from '@material-symbols/svg-600/outlined/face.svg'; // Face is a React component that renders the SVG function App() { return (
); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing Material Symbols Font Settings DESCRIPTION: CSS example showing how to customize variable font axes like fill settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/700/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` .material-symbols-outlined { font-variation-settings: 'FILL' 0; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing Material Symbols Font Variable Axes in CSS DESCRIPTION: Example of customizing the variable font axes (fill) for Material Symbols icons using CSS. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/500/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` .material-symbols-outlined { font-variation-settings: 'FILL' 0; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing Material Symbols Font Variation Settings DESCRIPTION: CSS example showing how to customize the variable font axes (fill) for Material Symbols icons using font-variation-settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/300/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` .material-symbols-outlined { font-variation-settings: 'FILL' 0; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols SVGs in Vue Components DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to import and use Material Symbols SVGs as Vue components using @svgv/webpack. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/_template/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols Font in Sass DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the Material Symbols font package in a Sass file, such as src/styles.scss in Angular CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/600/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` @import '@material-symbols/font-600'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing Material Symbols Font Variations in CSS DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to customize the variable font axes (fill) for Material Symbols using CSS font-variation-settings property. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/200/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` .material-symbols-outlined { font-variation-settings: 'FILL' 0; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols in Vue with @svgv/webpack DESCRIPTION: Example of importing and using Material Symbols SVGs as Vue components using @svgv/webpack. The code shows how to import, register, and use an SVG component in a Vue template. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/100/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols Font in Sass with Webpack Configuration DESCRIPTION: Example of importing Material Symbols font in Sass with additional configuration for webpack or Vue CLI to resolve path issues. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/500/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` $material-symbols-font-path: '~@material-symbols/font-500/'; @import '@material-symbols/font-500'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Optimizing Build Size by Importing Specific Styles DESCRIPTION: Example of how to reduce build size by importing only the specific styles needed instead of the complete package. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/material-symbols/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` -import 'material-symbols'; +import 'material-symbols/outlined.css'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing SVGs as Vue Components DESCRIPTION: Example of importing Material Symbols SVGs as Vue components using @svgv/webpack, showing both the template usage and component registration. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/600/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols Font in Sass DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the @material-symbols/font-400 package in Sass files, such as styles.scss in Angular CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/400/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` @import '@material-symbols/font-400'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Optimizing Material Symbols Font Import for Build Size DESCRIPTION: JavaScript diff showing how to reduce build size by importing only the necessary styles instead of the full index.css file. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/600/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` -import '@material-symbols/font-600'; +import '@material-symbols/font-600/outlined.css'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Reducing Build Size by Importing Specific Styles DESCRIPTION: Code diff showing how to reduce build size by importing only the needed styles instead of the default index.css which includes CSS for all fonts. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/100/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: diff CODE: ``` -import '@material-symbols/font-100'; +import '@material-symbols/font-100/outlined.css'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Optimizing Build Size by Importing Specific CSS Files DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to reduce build size by importing only the specific style variant needed (outlined.css) instead of the default index.css. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/200/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` -import '@material-symbols/font-200'; +import '@material-symbols/font-200/outlined.css'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Specific Material Symbols Font Styles in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Example of importing only the outlined icons style to reduce build size in JavaScript. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/500/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import '@material-symbols/font-500/outlined.css'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols with Angular mat-icon Component DESCRIPTION: Examples showing how to display Material Symbols icons in Angular applications using the mat-icon component with different fontSet attributes. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/200/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` face face face ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Material Symbols Font Path in Sass for Webpack DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to configure the Material Symbols font path in Sass when using webpack or Vue CLI to avoid import errors. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/200/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` $material-symbols-font-path: '~@material-symbols/font-200/'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols in Sass DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the material-symbols package in Sass files, such as in Angular CLI projects. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/material-symbols/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` @import 'material-symbols'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols in CSS DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the material-symbols package in CSS files, such as in Angular CLI projects. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/material-symbols/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` @import 'material-symbols'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Material Symbols Font Path in Sass for Webpack/Vue DESCRIPTION: Sass variable configuration to set the font path for Material Symbols when using webpack or Vue CLI to resolve path issues. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/400/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` $material-symbols-font-path: '~@material-symbols/font-400/'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols in Sass DESCRIPTION: Sass code showing how to import Material Symbols font in Sass files, such as styles.scss in Angular CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/100/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` @import '@material-symbols/font-100'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols Font in Sass DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the Material Symbols font in a Sass file, such as src/styles.scss in Angular CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/300/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` @import '@material-symbols/font-300'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols in Sass DESCRIPTION: Sass import statements including configuration for webpack compatibility. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/_template/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` $material-symbols-font-path: '~@material-symbols/font-{{weight}}/'; @import '@material-symbols/font-{{weight}}'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing SVGs with Create React App DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to import Material Symbols SVGs in Create React App or other environments using @svgr/webpack with file-loader. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/_template/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import { ReactComponent as Face } from '@material-symbols/svg-{{weight}}/outlined/face.svg'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols SVGs in Vue with @svgv/webpack DESCRIPTION: Example of importing and using Material Symbols SVGs as Vue components using @svgv/webpack. The imported SVG becomes a Vue component that can be used in templates. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/700/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Linking Material Symbols Font in HTML DESCRIPTION: Example of linking the Material Symbols font CSS file in an HTML document. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/500/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing SVG with Create React App DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to import a Material Symbols SVG as a React component when using @svgr/webpack with file-loader as in Create React App. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/400/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { ReactComponent as Face } from '@material-symbols/svg-400/outlined/face.svg'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: React Usage with File Loader DESCRIPTION: Example of importing SVG icons in React when using @svgr/webpack with file-loader. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/500/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import { ReactComponent as Face } from '@material-symbols/svg-500/outlined/face.svg'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Material Symbols Font Path for Webpack or Vue CLI DESCRIPTION: Sass configuration to set the font path for Material Symbols when using webpack or Vue CLI to resolve import issues. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/600/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` $material-symbols-font-path: '~@material-symbols/font-600/'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Material Symbols Font Path for Webpack or Vue CLI DESCRIPTION: Sass configuration to set the font path variable for Material Symbols when using Webpack or Vue CLI to prevent path resolution errors. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/300/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` $material-symbols-font-path: '~@material-symbols/font-300/'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Material Symbols Font Path for Webpack/Vue CLI in Sass DESCRIPTION: Sass code showing how to set the material-symbols-font-path variable to fix errors with webpack or Vue CLI before importing. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/100/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` $material-symbols-font-path: '~@material-symbols/font-100/'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing SVGs in Create React App DESCRIPTION: Example of importing Material Symbols SVGs in Create React App, which uses @svgr/webpack with file-loader, requiring a different import syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/600/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { ReactComponent as Face } from '@material-symbols/svg-600/outlined/face.svg'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing SVG as React Component using @svgr/webpack DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to import a Material Symbols SVG as a React component using @svgr/webpack and render it in a React application. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/400/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import Face from '@material-symbols/svg-400/outlined/face.svg'; // Face is a React component that renders the SVG function App() { return (
); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols Font in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the @material-symbols/font-400 package in JavaScript files, such as index.js in Create React App or main.js in Vue CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/400/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import '@material-symbols/font-400'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Code showing how to import Material Symbols font in JavaScript files, such as index.js in Create React App or main.js in Vue CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/100/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import '@material-symbols/font-100'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols Font in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the Material Symbols font in a JavaScript file, such as src/index.js in Create React App or src/main.js in Vue CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/300/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import '@material-symbols/font-300'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols SVGs in React with create-react-app DESCRIPTION: Example of importing and using Material Symbols SVGs in Create React App, which uses @svgr/webpack with file-loader. The ReactComponent import syntax is used. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/700/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import { ReactComponent as Face } from '@material-symbols/svg-700/outlined/face.svg'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols SVGs in React DESCRIPTION: Example of importing and using a Material Symbol SVG as a React component using @svgr/webpack. Shows how to render the SVG in a React application. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/svg/300/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import Face from '@material-symbols/svg-300/outlined/face.svg'; // Face is a React component that renders the SVG function App() { return (
); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols in CSS DESCRIPTION: Code showing how to import Material Symbols font in CSS files, such as styles.css in Angular CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/100/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` @import '@material-symbols/font-100'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols in CSS DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to import the Material Symbols font in CSS files, such as src/styles.css in Angular CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/200/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` @import '@material-symbols/font-200'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols Font in CSS DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the @material-symbols/font-400 package in CSS files, such as styles.css in Angular CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/400/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` @import '@material-symbols/font-400'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols Font in CSS DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the Material Symbols font in a CSS file, such as src/styles.css in Angular CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/300/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` @import '@material-symbols/font-300'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Material Symbols Font in CSS DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the Material Symbols font package in a CSS file, such as src/styles.css in Angular CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/marella/material-symbols/blob/main/font/500/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` @import '@material-symbols/font-500'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Material Symbols in Create React App DESCRIPTION: Example of importing and using Material Symbols SVGs in Create React App, which uses @svgr/webpack with file-loader, requiring a slightly different import syntax.
